title: Why can I play as multiple unlocked champions that are not in Free Rotation
body: I am able to play as wukong and jinx and they are not even in the free rotation. I have not bought them either.

replies.body:
Fixed free rotation until lv 6 incl. champs like Lux and Varus.

Edit: as in, until you are lv. 6 that will be your free rotation then you will get the normal one. It's for new players.
Hmmmm that is kinda weird. If you could take a picture of what your collection looks like, as well as your pool of champs on the champ select screen I can take a look into what's going on for ya!
Edit: It seems like a free rotation bug, I cannot use the champions in free rotation...but I can use some that I do not even own
